document_data.name: Benign Projection
document_data.Effects: This spell was almost identical to the ''[[project image]]'' spell but with some key differences. The projected image could only cast spells from specific [[schools of magic]]: [[abjuration]], [[conjuration]] and [[divination]].
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a [[divine focus]] and a sacrifice of the caster's strength.
